constraints.constraint_definition: CHECK ((((user_id IS NOT NULL) AND (role_name IS NULL)) OR ((user_id IS NULL) AND (role_name IS NOT NULL))))

columns.column_comment: Cost for using the location (overrides location default)
Flat rate per game for this location
Original filename of the uploaded document
Storage path or URL for the document
MIME type of the document (e.g., application/pdf)
User ID of who uploaded the document
User ID of the note author (typically the mentor)
Title or subject of the note
Rich text content from TinyMCE editor
Whether this note is private to the mentor or visible to mentee
Date when the mentorship relationship began
Date when the mentorship relationship ended (null for active)
Current status of the mentorship relationship
General notes about the mentorship relationship

organizations.comment: Multi-tenant organizations. Each org has isolated data.

columns.column_comment: Whether the referee profile is active

regions.comment: Geographic or organizational regions within an organization

columns.column_comment: Detailed description of the role and its responsibilities
Whether this role is currently active
Hex color code for role badges and display

user_region_assignments.comment: Assigns users specific roles in specific regions

columns.column_comment: Optional expiration date for temporary role assignments
